snippet: A university softball player told authorities she had been assaulted at an off-campus party, and the police said they believe the episode was filmed using a cellphone.
abstract: New Jersey prosecutors are investigating cellphone video of alleged sexual assault that was apparently filmed at party and circulated among students at Seton Hall University in November; university softball player told authorities she had been assaulted at off-campus party.
lead_paragraph: A university softball player told authorities she had been assaulted at an off-campus party, and the police said they believe the episode was filmed using a cellphone.

headline.main: Video of Alleged Sex Assault Is Investigated at Seton Hall
headline.print_headline: Video of Alleged Sex Assault Is Investigated at Seton Hall
